ComicInfo.Summary: After finding old comic books in which the hero beats their parents again and again, the Gladstone's cadets band together to go head to head against the old superhero in an effort to restore their parents' villainous honor! Then things go horribly wrong...
ComicInfo.Characters: Ghost Girl,Mummy Girl,Skull Brother Two,Kid Nefarious,Martian Jones,Skull Brother One
